segments.text: The scene inside this kitchen is quite chaotic, to say the least.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult is oblivious to a major water leak, while children attempt a risky cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I look out the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so perfectly calm and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a neat path and well-tended bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a stark contrast to the impending mess indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidiness outside just highlights the disarray happening right here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can such a peaceful exterior exist next to such interior drama?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes the indoor situation feel more dramatic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find the juxtaposition really quite unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything outside seems to be in its right place, unlike inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This house holds two very different realities at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm view through the window almost mocks the chaos within.
segments.speaker: PAR
